DrawSettings Class Reference

Objects of this class contains data for how to draw an item on the screen. More...

#include <DrawSettings.h>

Public Attributes

  • GDUtils::Color::CoolColor m_color
    The color of the feature to draw on the screen.
  • drawstyle_t m_style
    True if the polygon should be filled, false otherwise.
  • int m_lineWidth
    The width, in pixels, of the line.
  • symbol_t m_symbol
    This is currently only used when the draw-style is SYMBOL.
  • poiStatus_t m_poiStatus
    This is currently only used when the symbol type is POI.

    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is POI.
  • ItemTypes::transportation_t m_transportationType
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is ROUTE_ORIGIN.
  • uint8 m_startingAngle
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is ROUTE_ORIGIN.
  • bool m_drivingOnRightSide
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is ROUTE_ORIGIN.
  • bool m_initialUTurn
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is ROUTE_ORIGIN.
  • ItemTypes::pointOfInterest_t m_poiType
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is POI.
  • bool m_multiplePOI
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is POI.
  • MC2String m_symbolImage
    This is currently only used when the symbol-type is USER_DEFINED.

Detailed Description

Objects of this class contains data for how to draw an item on the screen.

Works almost like a struct, the only differance is that the members are resetted when created.

enum DrawSettings::poiStatus_t
 

Enumeration values:
singlePOI  Just a single POI.
multiSamePOI  Several POIs of the same type.
multiDifferentPOI  Several POIs of different type.

Definition at line 69 of file DrawSettings.h.

enum DrawSettings::symbol_t
 

Enumeration values:
ROUTE_ORIGIN_SYMBOL 
ROUTE_DESTINATION_SYMBOL 
ROUTE_PARK_SYMBOL 
SQUARE_3D_SYMBOL  A 3-d square, e.g. used for big cities in less detailed levels.
SMALL_CITY_SYMBOL 
POI_SYMBOL  POI symbols.
PIN  PIN.
USER_DEFINED  USER_DEFINED, check symbolImage for precise image.
DANGER  DANGER.
ROADWORK  ROADWORK.
SPEED_CAMERA  Speed camera.
USER_DEFINED_SPEED_CAMERA  User defined speed camera.
